= Used By =
The following projects are using our code:
  * *[http://openjpa.apache.org/ Apache OpenJPA]* - is using the agimatec-jsr303 implementation to test their support for JSR-303 as an optional component of their implementation of the JSR-317 JPA 2.0 specification. 

<br>

= More =
You need to know more? Ask for more documentation. Tell us what you want to know and we will try to document it here.

We want to know your option and are curious to know your use cases for the validation framework (many different are possible, e.g. validation in an EJB container, validation for a Swing app, webapp or AJAX app. Code generation, GUI generation, scaffolding, etc.)
Write us! We appreciate your comments.
